snippet.title: Prince Harry whisks girlfriend Meghan Markle off to Africa for romantic break - amid speculation he may propose
snippet.content:
Will Prince Harry marry Meghan Markle "By the end of summer"? 0:54
Prince Harry is reportedly planning a very special proposal for his girlfriend Meghan Markle on the anniversary of their first date.
July 17th 2017 21 days ago /display/newscorpaustralia.com/Web/NewsNetwork/Entertainment - syndicated/
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle walking on the runway at an airport in Africa.
Share
PRINCE Harry has whisked TV star girlfriend Meghan Markle off on a romantic African birthday escape as speculation mounts a proposal is imminent. The couple touched down on Friday, Markle's 36th birthday, in Botswana. An intimate safari is on the couple's agenda as are boat trips, camping under the stars and dawn bush treks.
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle walking on the runway at an airport in Africa.Source:The Sun Some royal observers believe may be keen to propose to the Suits star before his birthday on September 15, when he turns 33.
Meghan Markle. Picture: GettySource:Supplied
Prince Harry. Picture: AFPSource:AFP It is understood he quietly visited Botswana two weeks ago as patron of the Rhino Conservation Botswana charity. It's believed he also scouted locations to ensure his trip with would be perfect. The royals are not unfamiliar with a romantic African proposal - Prince William popped the question to Kate Middleton on a 2010 holiday to Kenya. Originally published as
